first_p: We provide a full cycle of transportation, including certification
second_p: Ensuring smooth and secure turnkey deliveries to our customers:
second_li1: Coordination of the work of all participants in the process
second_li3: Interaction with state authorities to obtain necessary documents
second_li4: Shipment of goods to the buyer
third_text1: We assist our clients with consolidated and complete loading, unloading, reloading and packing of shipments
third_text2: Clearance of cargo by customs brokers.Customs clearance of cargoes, including sanctioned cargoes
third_text3: Obtaining authorization documents in the state authorities of the Kyrgyz Republic for import and export. Obtaining declaration of conformity, certificates of conformity, etc.
third_text4: Our company assists with customs, tax legislation of the Kyrgyz Republic, the Eurasian Economic Union and the World Trade Organization.
third_text5: Upon customers' request, we provide cargo insurance through partner insurance complexes
fourth_h3: If your shipment is ready to go
fourth_p: Fill out the Application Form and get a quote for your shipment
fifth_text1: Our specialists ensure 100% safety of your cargo at all stages of transportation.
fifth_text2: We guarantee delivery of your shipment on time, without delays.
fifth_text3: Our logistics company ensures that all costs are confirmed to the client.
fifth_text4: We provide a full package of documents for smooth transportation across borders.
fifth_text5: Every customer is important to us. We offer customized solutions for every project.
fifth_text6: Our logistics company provides only reliable routes and trusted suppliers.
seventh_sliderP: Thank you for the excellent service and professional support. It is not the first time I have used the services of this company and I can confidently recommend it to friends and acquaintances
